description: I click on launch and nothing happens. Ubuntu 18.04
The file was the only content of the first folder but catfish didn't find it.
Works well for me finding file types over a network usbshare (18.04)

…with many useful features such as filtering by type and hidden, different views, exact match and more.
I can confirm that the "Launch" - button in Software isn't working for this app.

You can't copy, move, or delete the file, even copying the path is not possible.

Should be removed from the standard installation because its so frustrating for Linux beginners, and Windows-Lover will love it as typical for Linux un-usability as desktop system.
summary: After finding a file, Catfish is useless

description: The search part works well, but you can't do much with the results. It would be nice to be able to drag and drop files found to a different directory.
Much better than the search in PCmanFm

open a shell and type catfish, then when it appears on your bar thing, right-click it and "add to favorites" - or if you know what you're doing , it's just in /usr/bin - so make a shortcut or do whatever you like... when I run it, I get these warnings, and other "critical" things, but I get them sometimes, and stuff still works, so how critical can it be? (then again, this one did *really* work, even though I still get the warning and CRITICAL message if I manually start it from a shell. I only looked for a few files, but it did what it says, and it very easily let me search from /  - which for some reason some programs have trouble with. (I'd go 5 start if it started when ya hit the "launch" button after installing)
summary: It DOES run, you gotta do something like..

description: For unto whom it appears it won't run, since the "Launch" button doesn't work... Use file manager or term or whatever and go to /usr/bin, and in there run catfish. Once it's running, just right-click the cat face and select "Add to Favorites" - then you can quit or whatever, and at least have an icon for it on your favorites bar. For the person who can't use the files found, check for the PEBCAK issue.
summary: DOES run, and lets you do as you wish with found items

description: I click on launch and nothing happens

efficace oui, mais impossible de faire autre chose que d'obtenir autre chose que l'adresse du/des fichiers. impossible de faire autre chose que de les ouvrir un par un. pour la suppression de masse par exemple, allez voir ailleurs
Системный файл не смог найти, хотя галочку, чтобы показывал скрытые файлы, ставил и обновлял базу данных после этого. Файл находился в поддиректории HOME.
